content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptablea) Describe one significant domestic reform undertaken by Napoleon as the ruler of France.b) Explain one way in which Napoleon spread revolutionary ideas across Europe.c) Explain one way in which European nationalism was a response to the French Revolution.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
